website_summaries.verdict: This attractive telescope bag fits a range of models and has exterior pockets for extra storage. Includes a lifetime guarantee.
pros: Shock-absorbing foam keeps your telescope safe in this one-size-fits-all bag
The water-repellent polyester fabric keeps your equipment safe and dry
Includes internal dividers and straps to protect equipment and keep everything in place
Measures 40 inches by 10.6 inches by 7 inches
cons: This bag is a snug fit for some telescopes, and the outer pockets are useless when the bag is filled to capacity

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier and better looking than those from competitors! Features inside pockets and very well-positioned padding along with a large, sturdy zipper the length of the bag and a well-positioned shoulder strap. This bag is perfect for my new William Optics ZenithStar 126; it seems to be made for this scope! Nice freebies too -- a couple of zip bags and a smartphone positioner for the eyepiece of any telescope. Can't praise this bag enough!
customer_reviews.author: James K. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Worke, just, for my Celestron 114LCM
customer_reviews.text: Managed to fit my Celestron 114LCM telescope in the bag. Plenty of extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Dennylxs

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE CARRYING CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice telescope carrying case. Plenty of room on the inside for carrying telescope, tripod, and divided sections for storing eyepieces, etc. The outer pockets are roomy enough to carry personal articles and/or additional telescope equipment. My husband and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for Celestron 102 DX StarSense Explorer
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect fit for the new Celestron StarSense Explorer refractor telescope. Had to bend down the knob Controls, but the tripod and OT fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Crebs

customer_reviews.title: Not padded as much as we'd hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: It fits our telescope but the padding is insufficient. I had to add a beach towel for additional padding. The price is a little high since it wasn't what I was hoping to get. Had to have a carry case so we will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowergal

customer_reviews.title: Best telescope bag.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Very sturdy. Well designed with padding, straps, storage compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Hotrod1120

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design, nice materials
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well engineered & built from durable materials. It is no substitute for a hard foam lined case, but is much more portable. It had a VERY strong fishy smell when first opened, but it went away after a few days of leaving it opened & airing it out.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Very good for scope and tripod, but ........
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Orion 90mm refractor and tripod very well. You’ll need a separate carrier for the Tripp’s head and counterweight.
customer_reviews.author: DCatSea

customer_reviews.title: Telescope case
customer_reviews.text: All parts fit perfect and structure is secure when transporting telescope from one place to another.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not 40" long and useless to me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure who measured this or how they got 40", but it's 38 at best and of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my telescope
customer_reviews.text: I have a Celestron Astromaster AZ 90, this did not fit naturally into the case. Clearly this is the telescope that doesn’t fit into the “most” bucket mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! It should cost more!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my scope perfectly. Very sturdy design. Great straps for easy carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case to transport my telescope... the pockets are great to keep all the parts organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I very much like how well made it was... the only problem I had it was extremely tight to fit the telescope properly.
customer_reviews.author: violeta b ogden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag fit my new telescope perfectly. It has great outside pockets and extra bags for the different eyepieces .
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wolter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case for a tripod and telescope.
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome buy. I baught this for my Gskyer 90mm telescope. Fits wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits Celestron Atro Master 130 nicely. Nice pockets on exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Right size case for a 34 inch long 4.5 diameter telescope
customer_reviews.text: Although the case couldn't hold all the pieces, e.g., the equatorial mount and counterweight had to go in checked-in luggage, the case was able to hold the 34" optical tube and lipod legs, allowing me to bring these on board as carry-on luggage.
customer_reviews.author: ERM

customer_reviews.title: Fits “most” telescopes.
customer_reviews.text: Fits “Most” telescopes. I own a Meade Polaris 130mm, and was unable to fit everything within the bag.
customer_reviews.author: taonpo7

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bag that holds my telescope perfectly and well protected. A real must for anyone wish to store or transport it.
customer_reviews.author: Karsten G Balleby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Comet Hunter telescope
customer_reviews.text: This bag covers all the bases for me. Rugged outer material with interior tie downs and flexible padding options. I can use the shoulder strap and the hand grab at the same time. Heavy double zipper, outside pockets provide extra padding too. 27 inch X 8 inch telescope fits snug but not tight. Been looking for ages......this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Anzini

product_meta.title: Multipurpose Telescope Case - Fits Most Telescopes - 40x10.6x7 inch - Bonus Smart Phone Adapter Included
feature_bullets: ✓ STARGAZING ON THE GO – Tired of being confined to stationary stargazing? Start your intergalactic adventure from anywhere with the Rhino BagMate telescope bag! This carrying case features a removable shoulder strap and velcro hand-carry strap, so you can easily take your telescope anywhere!

✓ PROTECTION RAIN OR SHINE – No matter where you take it or whatever the weather holds, your telescope will stay protected. Whether you are camping, hiking, or riding your bike, this carrying case is made from water repellent polyester fabric to keep your equipment safe – even if there’s rain along your route!

✓ SERIOUSLY STRONG STORAGE – Flimsy telescope cases can damage your equipment. That’s why this durable bag provides complete protection with military-grade materials, including shock-absorbing foam on both the side and bottom. Rhino BagMate prevents damage so you can focus on enjoying a night under the stars.

✓ ONE SIZE FITS ALL – Pack all your equipment for every trek with your Rhino BagMate carrying case. This case comes with Velcro dividers that can be adjusted for all your gear. That means it also functions as a camera bag. Plus, accessory pouches line the outside of the case, so you never have to be without your favorite gizmos.
✓ LIFETIME GUARANTEE – We never want your telescope bag to cause cloudy days (or nights). That’s why your purchase is protected by our lifetime guarantee.
